reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF SOOD v. APPS, 1 A.D.2d 939 [4th Dept 1956]

caption.center: In the Matter of SATYA PAL SOOD et al., Appellants, against EDWARD R. APPS,
as City Clerk of the City of Syracuse, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Onondaga Special Term.
opinion.opinion_text: Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements. All concur.
